? No wonder Odis wanted to help her. Even I, with my beautiful wife, would have done so!

35768.「もしかしてぇ ハラペコな感じですかー？\n<br>\n「じつはー 王子さまの提:
Are you feeling a little hungry? Actually, there is a proposal from the prince to turn this place into a

I know it is taken for granted by the people of this country that the king is a woman. However, I will certainly

Before I know it, there's one more member of the royal family. Who is it? Every time I serve breakfast, lunch

35773.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「……私は この:
I should not be allowed to live in this time. But I was freed from the eternal water, and here I am, alive. I
